snippet: The "big" teams in the Premier League have not turned on the turbochargers yet, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri said, as his side sit level on points with leaders Arsenal after a surprise transformation from regulation strugglers....

headline.main: Big Teams Have Not Switched on Yet, Says Leicester's Ranieri
headline.print_headline: Big Teams Have Not Switched on Yet, Says Leicester's Ranieri

lead_paragraph: The "big" teams in the Premier League have not turned on the turbochargers yet, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri said, as his side sit level on points with leaders Arsenal after a surprise transformation from regulation strugglers.

snippet: Swedish striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic said on Wednesday that Jose Mourinho would be the manager to bring the Premier League title back to Manchester United, but he declined to comment whether he had received an offer to play at the club next season....

headline.main: Ibrahimovic Backs Mourinho but Tightlipped on Future
headline.print_headline: Ibrahimovic Backs Mourinho but Tightlipped on Future

lead_paragraph: Swedish striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic said on Wednesday that Jose Mourinho would be the manager to bring the Premier League title back to Manchester United, but he declined to comment whether he had received an offer to play at the club next season.

snippet: Raffaele Riva resigned on Wednesday as chairman of Watford, the Premier League club being investigated over allegations of falsified financial information before the current owner completed his takeover....
lead_paragraph: Raffaele Riva resigned on Wednesday as chairman of Watford, the Premier League club being investigated over allegations of falsified financial information before the current owner completed his takeover.

snippet: Southampton manager Ronald Koeman is bracing for a revenge-minded Arsenal side when the Saints visit the Emirates Stadium for a Premier League clash on Tuesday....

headline.main: Saints Expect Arsenal to Come Out With All Guns Blazing
headline.print_headline: Saints Expect Arsenal to Come Out With All Guns Blazing

lead_paragraph: Southampton manager Ronald Koeman is bracing for a revenge-minded Arsenal side when the Saints visit the Emirates Stadium for a Premier League clash on Tuesday.

snippet: Aston Villa suffered another setback in their desperate Premier League survival fight when winger Adama Traore was ruled out for 10 weeks with a foot injury on Thursday....

headline.main: Aston Villa's Traore Out for 10 Weeks With Broken Foot
headline.print_headline: Aston Villa's Traore Out for 10 Weeks With Broken Foot

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa suffered another setback in their desperate Premier League survival fight when winger Adama Traore was ruled out for 10 weeks with a foot injury on Thursday.

snippet: Everton manager Ronald Koeman was pleased his public criticism of Ross Barkley had elicited the right response after the midfielder gave a strong performance in the club's 3-1 win over Middlesbrough on Saturday....

headline.main: Koeman Pleased With Barkley Response in Middlesbrough Win
headline.print_headline: Koeman Pleased With Barkley Response in Middlesbrough Win

lead_paragraph: Everton manager Ronald Koeman was pleased his public criticism of Ross Barkley had elicited the right response after the midfielder gave a strong performance in the club's 3-1 win over Middlesbrough on Saturday.

snippet: Manager Alex Neil believes the foundations have been laid for Premier League survival after Norwich City registered their third away victory of the season against West Bromwich Albion on Saturday....

headline.main: Canaries Boss Neil Sees Foundations for Survival in Place
headline.print_headline: Canaries Boss Neil Sees Foundations for Survival in Place

lead_paragraph: Manager Alex Neil believes the foundations have been laid for Premier League survival after Norwich City registered their third away victory of the season against West Bromwich Albion on Saturday.

snippet: Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic has compared his footballing prowess to a fine red wine that improves with age, with the Swede also claiming he can continue to play for another 15 years....

headline.main: Evergreen Zlatan Likens Himself to Fine Red Wine
headline.print_headline: Evergreen Zlatan Likens Himself to Fine Red Wine

lead_paragraph: Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic has compared his footballing prowess to a fine red wine that improves with age, with the Swede also claiming he can continue to play for another 15 years.

snippet: Captain Wayne Rooney says there is enough talent in the "fantastic" Manchester United squad to launch a serious challenge for the Premier League title despite a mixed start to the campaign....

headline.main: Rooney Expects Big Things of 'Fantastic' United
headline.print_headline: Rooney Expects Big Things of 'Fantastic' United

lead_paragraph: Captain Wayne Rooney says there is enough talent in the "fantastic" Manchester United squad to launch a serious challenge for the Premier League title despite a mixed start to the campaign.
